item.title: ☕ engripaye/ci-cd-k8s-pipeline (11 ⭐)
item.description:
👤 Owner: engripaye

📝 Repository: engripaye/ci-cd-k8s-pipeline

📄 Descrizione: ⚙️ A DevOps project demonstrating a complete CI/CD pipeline for backend microservices. The pipeline automates testing, building, and deployment of Python and Java microservices using GitHub Actions and Jenkins, with Docker and Kubernetes for containerized deployment. Prometheus and Grafana provide monitoring and observability for reliability.

⭐ Stelle: 11

🍴 Forks: 0

💻 Linguaggio: Java

📜 Licenza: No license

⏰ Creato il: 2025-08-31T02:30:39Z

]]>
